start_message:
Hello!
Send me a link to a YouTube or Twitch video, and I will make short viral videos for YT Shorts/Reels/Tiktok ‚ö°Ô∏è
language_set: Language has been set to English.

Invite a friend and get a discount on your next purchase!

üîó Your link: `{referral_link}`
help_text:
This bot creates short viral videos from YouTube or Twitch videos.

Available commands:
/start - Generate shorts
/menu - Show this message
/topup - Top up balance
/referral - Invite a friend
/feedback - Leave feedback
/lang - Change language

@sf_tsupport_bot - for any questions

Top up balance ‚Äì /topup
